```{r setup}
library(meta.arrR)

```

```{r}

# get starting values
starting_values <- meta.arrR::meta.arrR_starting_values

# get parameters
parameters <- meta.arrR::meta.arrR_parameters

n <- 5

starting_values$pop_n <- rep(x = 5, n = n)

# create 5 reef cells in center of seafloor
reef_matrix <- matrix(data = c(-1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, -1, 0, 0), 
                      ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)

# setup extent and grain
dimensions <- c(100, 100)

grain <- c(1, 1)

# set time per iterations
min_per_i <- 120

# run the model for n years
years <- 1
max_i <- (60 * 24 * 365 * years) / min_per_i

# save results only every m days
days <- 5
save_each <- 1 # (24 / (min_per_i / 60)) * days

max_i %% save_each

parameters$move_stationary <- max_i / (5 * 4)

metasyst <- setup_meta(n = n, dimensions = dimensions, grain = grain, reefs = reef_matrix, 
                       starting_values = starting_values, parameters = parameters)

nutr_input <- simulate_nutr_input(n = n, max_i = max_i,
                                  freq_mn = 5, freq_sd = 0.1,
                                  input_max = starting_values$nutrients_pool,
                                  input_sd = 0.1)

plot(nutr_input)
```
